channel.title: 发行版 on Linux 学习笔记
channel.description: Recent content in 发行版 on Linux 学习笔记

item.title: CentOS
item.description: CentOS yum 安装本地 rpm 包 rpm -qs | grep jdk yum install -y /xxx/xxx.rpm # localinstall 已过时 # yum localinstall -y /xxx/xxx.rpm 第三方源 EPEL Extra Packages for Enterprise Linux EPEL is a Fedora Special Interest Group that creates, maintains, and manages a high quality set of additional packages for Enterprise Linux, including, but not limited to, Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL), CentOS and Scientific Linux (SL), Oracle Linux (OL). yum install -y epel-release
